name: Airbus Flight Academy Europe
baseAirport: The Company owned aircraft are modern, fitted with full glass cockpit avionic and are IFR rated (except the Elixir) . In addition, Airbus Flight Academy Europe operates on its site and customer sites a fleet of FNPT 2 qualified simulators to offer the best training solutions to student pilots. Now, Airbus Flight Academy Europe deploys its own pilot training capacity while joining the Airbus Pilot Cadet Training Programme. The training center sited in Angoulême, South West of France, offers all needed training facilities and assets to provide our cadets the best training conditions.
about: Airbus Flight Academy Europe, a 100% subsidiary of Airbus, is based in Angoulême, France, and has been providing top-tier flight training since 2006. Initially supporting the French Air Force and Navy, the academy now offers the Airbus Pilot Cadet Training Programme, open to students worldwide. The programme focuses on competency-based training, preparing cadets for smooth integration into operational environments. With a fleet including Cirrus SR20, Diamond DA42, and new Elixir aircraft, along with advanced flight simulators, the academy ensures comprehensive training. Located in a charming region with pleasant weather and moderate living costs, Airbus Flight Academy Europe provides an ideal environment for aspiring pilots to launch their careers. The academy also offers support with accommodation and funding through local bank partnerships.
